title: MCLauncher的问题，关于正版登陆
author: mymaxx
txt_content:
我用的是MClauncher
一选择正版登陆就出现 program internal error number is 1
我想登陆正版啊

replies.author: sahdsg
replies.txt_content:
用正版登录器

英文的
https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecra ... ncher/Minecraft.exe

replies.author: YZC
replies.txt_content:
用正版启动器吧，或者换一个盗版启动器
如果采纳，请给最佳

replies.author: mymaxx
replies.txt_content:

不好意思，你不是正版
你也太无聊了，没买正版我会来发帖？
